name: UUserDefinedCaptureProtocol
doc: A blueprintable capture protocol that defines how to capture frames from the engine

methods.name: GenerateFilename
methods.doc: Generate a filename for the current frame

methods.name: GetCurrentFrameMetrics
methods.doc: Access this protocol's current frame metrics

methods.name: OnBeginFinalize
methods.doc: Called when this protocol is going to be shut down - should not capture any more frames

methods.name: OnCanFinalize
methods.doc: Called to check whether this protocol has finished any pending tasks, and can now be shut down

methods.name: OnCaptureFrame
methods.doc: Called when this protocol should capture the current frame

methods.name: OnFinalize
methods.doc: Called to complete finalization of this protocol

methods.name: OnPauseCapture
methods.doc: Called when this protocol should temporarily stop capturing frames

methods.name: OnPixelsReceived
methods.doc: Called when pixels have been received for the specified stream name

methods.name: OnPreTick
methods.doc:
Called before the capture process itself is ticked, before each frame is set up for capture
Useful for any pre-frame set up or resetting the previous frame's state

methods.name: OnSetup
methods.doc:
Called once at the start of the capture process, but before any warmup frames
@return true if this protocol set up successfully, false otherwise

methods.name: OnStartCapture
methods.doc: Called when this protocol should start capturing frames

methods.name: OnTick
methods.doc: Called after the capture process itself is ticked, after the frame is set up for capture, but before most actors have ticked

methods.name: OnWarmUp
methods.doc: Called when the capture process is warming up. Protocols may transition from either an initialized, or capturing state to warm-up

methods.name: ResolveBuffer
methods.doc:
* Resolve the specified buffer and pass it directly to the specified handler when done (does not pass to any bound streams)
*
* @param Buffer          The desired buffer to save
* @param BufferID        The ID of this buffer that is passed to the pixel handler (e.g. a composition pass name).

methods.name: StartCapturingFinalPixels
methods.doc:
Instruct this protocol to start capturing LDR final pixels (including slate widgets and burn-ins)

@param StreamID        The identifier to use for the final pixels buffer

methods.name: StopCapturingFinalPixels
methods.doc: Instruct this protocol to stop capturing LDR final pixels
